reference.title: Package Signature Removal dialog
reference.shortdesc: Removes all signatures from one or more signed Android packages (APKs). Note that in order to remove signatures from multiple packages at once, they must all reside in the same directory.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click (Remove Package Signatures) in the Signing and Keys view, when you right click in the Package Explorer and select MOTODEV Studio Remove Package Signatures , or when you select Signing Remove Package Signatures from the MOTODEV menu.

strow.stentry: Path to the folder in which the signed Android package (.apk) files reside.
Lists the Android package files found in the directory specified by Packages folder. Select at least one of them.
